document.full_text: representative edward whitfield, republican of kentucky, and senator tom udall, democrat of new mexico, introduced legislation wednesday to end the use of performance-enhancing drugs in horse racing.
document.title: the rail: legislation targets drug use in horse racing
lines_and_colors: representative edward whitfield, republican of kentucky, and senator tom udall, democrat of new mexico, introduced legislation wednesday to end the use of performance-enhancing drugs in horse racing.
